targets.expr: sum by(pod, xstore_name, xstore_role) (mysql_up{xstore_name="$xstore_name", polardbx_role="dn", namespace="$namespace"})

sum(polardbx_container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{xstore_name="$xstore", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", container="engine", resource="cpu", unit="core"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{xstore_name="$xstore", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container="engine", id=~"^/kubepods.*"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{xstore_name="$xstore", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", container="engine", resource="memory", unit="byte"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left() mysql_up{xstore_name="$xstore", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"})

sum(polardbx_container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace="$namespace", container="engine"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left(xstore_name) mysql_up{xstore_name="$xstore", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"}) by (xstore_name)
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", container="engine", resource="cpu", unit="core"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left(xstore_name) mysql_up{xstore_name="$xstore", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"}) by (xstore_name)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", container="engine", id=~"^/kubepods.*"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left(xstore_name) mysql_up{xstore_name="$xstore", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"}) by (xstore_name)
/
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", container="engine", resource="memory", unit="byte"}
* on(namespace,pod)
  group_left(xstore_name) mysql_up{xstore_name="$xstore", namespace="$namespace", polardbx_role="dn", xstore_role="leader"}) by (xstore_name)
